result.execSummary:
The defendant Leonard J Litt Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Cash bail applied.  Balance to be paid in full by 12-01-2015 or serve 5 days jail as penalty for failure to pay.  DNA surcharge is waived.

Straight Time.
Apply 8 days sentence credit.
TIME SERVED.

Case 15CM953 is dismissed and read in.  
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Leonard J Litt Jr

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Ted S. Szczupakiewicz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant Leonard J Litt in court with attorney J Anthony Rosario.  

Defendant enters a plea of Guilty to the charge.
Court finds the defendant Guilty of the charge.

Court orders the following:
10 Days in the Waukesha County Jail.
8 Days Credit.
Time Served.

Costs: $243
DNA Sample.  - Court waives the DNA Surcharge.
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
D.V. Surcharge:  $100
Apply Bail.
Balance to be paid in full by :  12/01/15
Alternate: 5  Days in the Waukesha County Jail - Straight-time.
Plea/sentencing hearing on August 31, 2015 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Leonard J Litt in court with attorney J Anthony Rosario.   
Case called along with:  15CM953  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 31, 2015 at 03:00 pm.

Defendant Leonard J Litt in court with attorney J Anthony Rosario.  
Case called along with:  15CM953
  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 27, 2015 at 02:00 pm.

Barbara A. Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant Leonard J Litt in court with attorney J Anthony Rosario. 
  Hearing scheduled for June 22, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Absolute sobriety, defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol.  Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed.  Defendant to have no contact with victim/witness listed in the Criminal Complaint including his residence.  Defendant to provide address to the Court within the next 2 business days.

Defendant Leonard J Litt in court, in custody, with attorney J Anthony Rosario.   Pablo Galaviz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.
